data.name: Destroying The Asteroids (Along With Unfair Hurdles)
data.detailed_description:
* There are 2 Asteroids in this Game. For Destroying each of the Asteroids, You have to go through many Hurdles like mazes, droppers, spinners, etc.

* Collide with any hurdles before the 1st Asteroid will result in respawning You at Starting Point.

* Collide with any hurdles after the 1st Asteroid and Before the 2nd Asteroid will result in respawning You at the 2nd Point (Where You had destroyed the 1st Asteroid).

* Find the Asteroid and Destroy it by Colliding with it (only Asteroid).

* The Game will Complete when You Destroy both the Asteroids. Good Luck :)

* WASD Keys or Arrow Keys are for Player Movements (No Need of the Mouse for Movement of the Player in this Game)

* It is advisable that please don't go for Speedrun of this Game at Start. Please complete the Game and practice it and then it will be easy to go for Speedrun

Note:-
Back to Main Menu button is not a Pause button

If You Complete the Game and want to take Screenshot of it then take it within 2.5 seconds (or press F12)

There is no continue, or save & load game option in it.
You Can Complete this Game in one go.

data.short_description: I have Created this Game For those who likes to go through the Challenges in the Games. Just Destroy the 2 Asteroids in this Game and that's it. But it is not easy. Unfair Hurdles will not allow to do it easily.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7,8 or 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
